channel.title: RuneFury
channel.description:
[center][img]http://runefury.com/runefury.png[/img][/center]
Play here: http://www.runefury.com
Play RuneFury http://www.runefury.com
Some Features:
- STRONG Dedicated Server - Pk, Skilling, Quest, Minigame &Boss server - All working Prayers including Retribution & Redemption - Reward Shops, for Pking, Skilling, Voting, Slayer. Even an Honour Shop for great Pkers - Castle Wars with working Barricades, Explosives and Tinderbox - Perfect Duel Arena - Full Hunting Skill - Optional Bank Pin + Bank Pin recovery feature for account safety. - Unique Quests designed only for RuneFury - Clue Scrolls offering great rewards - Don't miss out on the action, register your account today.
